change.changenote: Section 7 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 189/2017, effective November 1, 2017.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Reference to consolidated regulations of British Columbia
bcl:section.bcl:text: A reference in an enacting regulation to a previously enacted regulation that at the time of the enactment of the enacting regulation is published in the looseleaf Consolidated Regulations of British Columbia shall, unless a contrary intention appears in the enacting regulation, be construed to be a reference to the previously enacted regulation as published in that consolidation.

change.changenote: Section 8 definition of "enacting authority", paragraphs (a) and (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the person who has the authority under an enactment to enact the regulation to be revised, or a person designated by him, or

in the case of a regulation that can be enacted by the Lieutenant Governor in Council, the minister responsible for administration of the enactment that is authority for enacting the regulation to be revised, or a person designated by him,

change.changenote: Section 11 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: If the enacting authority approves the revised regulation he shall endorse it as approved and deposit it with the registrar, and the Act, except sections 2 and 3 (2), applies to the revised regulation the same as if the regulation had been originally enacted.
